name: Nocturnal WhatsApp
description: A theme for the browser version of WhatsApp, on the same design style as the Nocturnal theme from Mokocchi, specifically a sort of 'port' from the Messenger theme. Use with Nocturnal for Windows 10 and Moko Firefox Theme. Also install Open Sans or change it. The theme is quite easy to edit, so feel free to make changes.
